titleStmt.title: A true account of the behaviour of Thomas Randal, who was executed at Stone-bridge, for killing the Quaker, on Wednesday the 29th of this instant January 1695[/]6
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1620-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for E. Mallet, near Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Date given according to Lady Day dating.
